summary: This is an FBI tactical operation plan detailing the planned arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell in Sutton, New Hampshire, on July 1, 2020. It outlines surveillance, coordination with local police, contingency plans, and identifies Maxwell's association with Scott Borgerson. The plan includes personnel assignments and safety protocols.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: British socialite and associate of Jeffrey Epstein, considered a flight risk with three citizenships, targeted for arrest in Sutton, New Hampshire.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Described as the girlfriend of Ghislaine Maxwell and a potential person of interest, but not an alleged subject at the time of the plan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the deceased associate of Ghislaine Maxwell in the suspect background information.

persons.name: SA Chambers
persons.context: Coordinating with the Sutton Police Department to ensure awareness of FBI operations during the arrest plan.

persons.name: SSA Philp Christiana
persons.context: Approved the tactical operation plan on June 30, 2020.

persons.name: ASAC Chad Creasey
persons.context: Approved the tactical operation plan on June 30, 2020.

connections.description: Described as associates, with Maxwell identified as the girlfriend of Borgerson.
Maxwell is identified as an associate of the deceased Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Planned Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: FBI tactical operation to locate and arrest Ghislaine Maxwell in the Sutton, New Hampshire / Lake Sunapee region using surveillance and coordination with local police.

events.title: Intelligence Received on Maxwell's Location
events.description: The New Hampshire Safe Streets Gang Task Force received information that Ghislaine Maxwell may be located in the Sutton, New Hampshire / Lake Sunapee region.

locations: Sutton, New Hampshire / Lake Sunapee Region
Sutton Police Department â€” 1N Road North Sutton NH 03260
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was considered a flight risk with three separate citizenships at the time of the planned arrest.
The FBI planned to use CAST and technical methods to locate Maxwell's phone and conduct surveillance before arresting her.
Maxwell was associated with Scott Borgerson, who was described as her girlfriend and a potential person of interest.
The arrest plan included contingency scenarios such as medical emergencies, barricaded subjects, and officer extraction.
The operation was a coordinated effort between the FBI New York Field Office, New Hampshire Safe Streets Gang Task Force, and local Sutton Police.
